item.description:
Center Stage at Showcase Cinemas Warwick
Saturday, March 14, 2009
8 pm

Here's something cool -- they've turned one of the movie theatres at Showcase Warwick into a comedy club. It has cabaret-style seating with dining tables and comfortable chairs, as well as stadium seating. (Sounds like the seating for "Cabaret" at Brown, although this theatre holds over 200 people and the chairs sound like they're a little more comfortable)!

They serve food, too -- Providence Monthly recommends the fried pickles and the Strawberry Pop'n Martini (rimmed with pop rocks). They also have a full menu of sandwiches, pizzas, etc. plus drinks. And apparently, if you want movie popcorn with butter, you can get that too.

There are two shows on Saturdays -- this Meetup is for the 8 p.m. show. The comedians listed areTony Daro and Mike Stork. Tony Daro has written for SNL, Leno, Letterman, etc. Here are some videos of him -- they're kind of old, but the Bike Cops one is pretty funny!

About MIKE STORK -- Take the unconventional, the unexpected, and occasionally, the unthinkable. Now make it all accessible, refreshingly original, and downright hilarious, and you begin to have a small glimpse into the stand-up comedy of Mike Stork.

Please buy your own ticket in advance -- at the theatre, by telephone at 1-800-315-4000 (be prepared for an exercise in frustration), or online at www.nationalamusements.com. Admission is $10 and seating is on a first come, first-seated basis. In order to get good seats, let's meet by 7:15 p.m. inside the lobby, near the Box Office closest to the back parking lot. Look for a small Meetup sign. If you're late, you may have to look for us inside the theatre. The show runs for 90 minutes, and it's over 18 only.

Please note: This is not the theatre at Warwick Mall, it's the one near E. Greenwich, across from Panera Bread.

After the show, for whoever is up for it, we can head down the road to E. Greenwich and grab a drink at the Grille on Main.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet near the Box Office closest to the back parking lot -- look for Meetup sign
item.name: Live Comedy -- Showcase Cinemas Warwick
